thread.section_title: ShoeDazzle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ShoeDazzle | www.shoedazzle.com | 4 of 122
thread.title: Danita

author: Danita
title: Danita
text:
I love the shoes that I get from Shoe Dazzle. I always get the best compliments and everyone always ask where do I get my shoes. I just love the many different styles that they have and you are not tied into buying anything if its not in your budget. I was skeptical at first but glad I gave it a try.
Will recommend to may of my friends if I have not already told them about Shoe dazzle.
